price: ហើយគេ(អ្នកដែលមិនមែនជនជាតិអារ៉ាប់)បានសូត្រ វាឱ្យពួកគេស្ដាប់ ពួកគេនៅតែមិនជឿនឹងវាដដែល។
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
